# International rankings of Rwanda

The following are international rankings of Rwanda.

|-
! Organization
! Survey
! Ranking
|-

| Global Peace Index
| 92 out of 163

| Human Development Index
| 159 out of 193
|-

| Corruption Perceptions Index
| 43 out of 180
|-

| 105 out of 177
